name: IntroCS
description: An introductory course on the fundamentals of computer science.

name: DiscreteMath
description: A course on logic, set theory, combinatorics, and graph theory.

name: ProgFund
description: A beginner's guide to programming concepts and techniques.

name: CompArch
description: Introduction to computer hardware, including CPU, memory, and I/O systems.

name: DataStruct
description: An overview of basic data structures like arrays, linked lists, and trees.

name: AlgDesign
description: A course on designing and analyzing algorithms.

name: OOP
description: An introduction to OOP concepts like classes, inheritance, and polymorphism.

name: Databases
description: A course on relational database concepts and SQL.

name: CompNet
description: Introduction to network protocols, topologies, and communication models.

name: SoftwareEng
description: An overview of software development methodologies and practices.

name: OS
description: A course on operating system principles, processes, and memory management.

name: WebDev
description: A practical introduction to front-end and back-end web development.

name: AI
description: Introduction to AI concepts, machine learning, and neural networks.

name: CloudComp
description: A course on cloud architecture, virtualization, and distributed systems.

name: HumanCompInt
description: Exploration of design principles and usability testing for user interfaces.

name: CyberSec
description: An introduction to security principles and practices in computing.

name: MobileDev
description: A course on building mobile apps for Android and iOS platforms.

name: DataSci
description: A hands-on course on data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

name: GameDev
description: Introduction to the development of interactive games using modern engines.

name: Capstone
description: A final year project synthesizing concepts learned throughout the program.

name: CompLog
description: Introduction to formal logic and its applications in computation.

name: CompTheo
description: Study of Turing machines, complexity theory, and automata.

name: NumMeth
description: Introduction to numerical techniques for solving mathematical problems.

name: ParallelComp
description: A course on parallel algorithms and multicore processing.

name: Graphics
description: Introduction to graphical rendering and visual computing techniques.

name: Cryptography
description: A course on encryption, decryption, and secure communication.

name: InfoRetrieval
description: Study of techniques for searching and retrieving information from large datasets.

name: BigData
description: A course on handling and analyzing large-scale datasets.

name: IoT
description: Introduction to IoT technologies and their applications.

name: SoftwareTesting
description: A practical course on software testing techniques and tools.

name: BlockChain
description: Introduction to blockchain and its applications in various domains.

name: CompVision
description: A course on image processing and object recognition techniques.

name: AdvDB
description: Study of NoSQL databases and advanced query techniques.

name: DevOps
description: Introduction to continuous integration and deployment practices.

name: BioInfo
description: Study of computational methods in biological data analysis.

name: Robotics
description: An introduction to robotics and control systems.

name: NLP
description: A course on computational linguistics and language modeling.

name: QuantumComp
description: Introduction to quantum algorithms and quantum mechanics in computing.

name: EthicsAI
description: Study of ethical implications of AI systems in society.

name: AdvProg
description: A deep dive into advanced programming paradigms and languages.
